metadata.title: CVE-2017-5488 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities inwp-admin/update-core.php in WordPress before 4.7.1 allow remote attackersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) name or (2) versionheader of a plugin.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
